title: Global hotkey to open Island (CMD+ยง)
description:
**Global Hotkey CMD+ยง**

1. Add HotKey package: https://github.com/soffes/HotKey
2. Create Services/HotKey/HotKeyManager.swift:
   - HotKey(key: .section, modifiers: [.command])
   - setup(openHandler:) and teardown()
3. Wire in AppDelegate:
   - applicationDidFinishLaunching: HotKeyManager.shared.setup { openIslandViaHotkey() }
   - applicationWillTerminate: HotKeyManager.shared.teardown()
   - openIslandViaHotkey(): viewModel.notchOpen(reason: .hotkey)
4. Add .hotkey case to NotchOpenReason enum

title: Light mode theme (dawnfox)
description:
**Light Mode Theme (Dawnfox)**

1. Create UI/Theme/Theme.swift:
   - Theme protocol with colors: background, backgroundElevated, textPrimary/Secondary/Dim, accent, success/warning/error, codeBackground, diffAdded/Removed
   - DarkTheme struct (current colors)
   - LightTheme struct (dawnfox: #faf4ed bg, #575279 fg, #b4637a accent)

2. Create UI/Theme/ThemeManager.swift:
   - @AppStorage preferredTheme (system/light/dark)
   - @Published currentTheme
   - ThemeKey environment key

3. Add ThemePickerRow to NotchMenuView (System/Light/Dark picker)

4. Update NotchView: remove .preferredColorScheme(.dark), inject theme via environment

title: Auto-remove inactive sessions
description:
**Auto-remove Inactive Sessions**

Add to SessionStore.swift:
1. Config constants: cleanupIntervalSeconds=30, localProcessCheckDelay=10, remoteTimeoutMinutes=10, absoluteTimeoutMinutes=30
2. Add cleanupTask: Task<Void, Never>? property
3. Add isProcessRunning(pid) using kill(pid, 0)
4. Add startCleanupTask() - runs every 30s
5. Add cleanupInactiveSessions() - checks:
   - Absolute timeout (30min)
   - Local: pid dead after 10s inactivity
   - Remote: 10min inactivity
6. Call startCleanupTask() from init()
